/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, creating a natural canopy overhead. Power lines stretch across the scene, following the path of the street. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, drawing the viewer into the scene.
